code: @Test public void testBeanRoutes() throws Exception {     AbstractXmlApplicationContext applicationContext = createApplicationContext().     CamelContext camelContext = SpringCamelContext.springCamelContext(applicationContext, true).     Invoker invoker = applicationContext.getBean("invokerProxy", Invoker.class).     String response = invoker.invoke(new Bean.SubClass()).     assertEquals("Hello from Sub", response).     camelContext.stop().     IOHelper.close(applicationContext). }
